description.value:
Black soot and ash covers your body when you claim this shard and enemies who subject you to force or flame do so at their peril.

Wondrous Item: Rare

Properties:

  • Your origin changes to elemental.
  • You can benefit from only one primordial shard at a time. If you carry more than one, none of them function.
  • You gain resist 10 fire. Level 22: Resist 20 fire.

Power ✦ At-Will (Immediate Interrupt)

Trigger: An adjacent enemy pulls, pushes, or slides you.

Effect: The triggering enemy grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Power ✦ Daily (Immediate Reaction)

Trigger: You take fire damage from an enemy attack.

Attack: Close burst 1 (enemies in the burst); the shard's level + 5 vs. Reflex

Hit: The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Level 22: Ongoing 10 fire damage.
